Text.Page:
They keep saying we should wait for confirmation, wait to find out why the Tenebrara randomly attacked us.

Waiting is for cowards! We must take action! They know my plans, though, and if they see me leave, they'll stop me.

If you get out there and kill enough of them, I'll see to it that you're known for your bravery.

Ha! Wonderful!

I'll keep my promise. You'll be known.
